description: SELECT M.CashAmount, M.CardAmount, M.TransferAmount, M.VoucherAmount, * FROM [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.POSPaymentMethod AS M WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE M.SalesOrdersID IN ()
body: SELECT M.CashAmount, M.CardAmount, M.TransferAmount, M.VoucherAmount, * FROM [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.POSPaymentMethod AS M WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE M.SalesOrdersID IN ($CURSOR$)
